metadata.title: CVE-2021-30604 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in ANGLE in Google Chrome prior to 92.0.4515.159 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
